question: Who was "Bahta Hagos"?
option1: A South African leader who resisted foreign domination
option2: An Ethiopian  leader who resisted foreign domination
option3: An Eritrean  leader who resisted foreign domination
option4: A Nigerian  leader who resisted foreign domination
answer: An Eritrean  leader who resisted foreign domination
explanation: Bahta Hagos was considered as an important leader of Eritrean resistance to foreign domination specifically against northern Ethiopian and Italian colonialism.
